languages.text: Во время ареста вас допрашивали с особым пристрастием, применяя насилие.
You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.
languages.original_text: Во время ареста вас допрашивали с особым пристрастием, применяя насилие.

traits.locale_text: You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.
You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.
You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.
You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.
You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.

languages.text: Vous avez été {mf|arrêté et interrogé|arrêtée et interrogée} à l'aide de méthodes aussi créatives que violentes.
languages.original_text: You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez été {mf|arrêté et interrogé|arrêtée et interrogée} à l'aide de méthodes aussi créatives que violentes.

languages.text: Te arrestaron e interrogaron con métodos tan ingeniosos como violentos.
languages.original_text: You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.

traits.locale_text: Te arrestaron e interrogaron con métodos tan ingeniosos como violentos.

languages.text: あなたは逮捕され、独創的で暴力的な方法で徹底的に尋問された。
languages.original_text: You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.

traits.locale_text: あなたは逮捕され、独創的で暴力的な方法で徹底的に尋問された。

languages.text: 你曾遭到过逮捕，被各种暴力手段变着花样拷问。
languages.original_text: You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.

traits.locale_text: 你曾遭到过逮捕，被各种暴力手段变着花样拷问。

languages.text: Du wurdest verhaftet und mit kreativen und grausamen Methoden gründlich verhört.
languages.original_text: You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.

traits.locale_text: Du wurdest verhaftet und mit kreativen und grausamen Methoden gründlich verhört.

languages.text: Tutuklandın ve şiddet dolu, yaratıcı yöntemler kullanılarak etraflıca sorgulandın.
languages.original_text: You were arrested and thoroughly interrogated using creative and violent methods.
